unnormalised: Real Estate Buzz: Are Rental Yields Still Giving You 'Dhoom'?
normalised: real estate buzz: are rental yields still giving you 'dhoom'?

unnormalised: Mumbai: Forget chasing box office hits like 'Dhoom 4'; smart investors are eyeing rental yields! Returns on rental properties are still a hot topic, especially in cities like Bangalore & Pune. Forget FD rates, right?
normalised: mumbai: forget chasing box office hits like 'dhoom four'; smart investors are eyeing rental yields! returns on rental properties are still a hot topic, especially in cities like bangalore and pune. forget F D rates, right?

unnormalised: While property prices in posh areas like Bandra have skyrocketed, rental yields are holding steady. Experts at the National Housing Bank (NHB) say smaller apartments (1BHK/2BHK) around Navi Mumbai and Thane are offering better ROI – think 3-4% gross yield.
normalised: while property prices in posh areas like bandra have skyrocketed, rental yields are holding steady. experts at the national housing bank (N H B) say smaller apartments (one B H K or two B H K) around navi mumbai and thane are offering better R O I – think three to four percent gross yield.

unnormalised: Don't expect double-digit returns overnight, yaar! It's a marathon, not a sprint. But if you're looking for a steady income stream, renting out that spare flat your parents left you in Delhi could be a good bet. Keep an eye on property taxes and maintenance costs, though. They can eat into your profits faster than you can say "Yeh Diwali, No Patakhe!" Rental yields are also affected by factors like the area's connectivity (near metro stations, highways) and if there are good schools nearby. So do your homework!
